sentence.Network_en: The moves contravene the peace plan agreed by both sides.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些举措违反了双方同意的和平方案.

sentence.Network_en: He said the article did not contravene the industry's code of conduct.
sentence.Network_cn: 他说这一条款并未违反行业的行为准则。

sentence.Network_en: Don't do whatever may contravene the law of the country.
sentence.Network_cn: 任何可能触犯国家法律的事都不能干.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 法律词汇_翻译家(Fanyijia.com) ... 得利者 beneficiary 抵触 contravene 抵押 mortgage.
“违反”(contravene)，用于条例所订明的规定或条件时，或用于根据、凭借条例而发给的批予、许可证、牌照、租约或权限文件之中所.
英语广播词汇（1） ... contras n. 尼加拉瓜反政府游击队 contravene vt. 违反，触犯 contribution n. 贡献，捐献.

list.abs: contravening equity应该专业些但that inflicts harm upon a party to the contract 把意思表达了,亦不错。有个问题请教tillerman 或是其他哪位做财经或是法律翻译.
Don ' t do whatever may contravene the law of the country ., 任何可能触犯国家法律的事都不能干.

regrettably , the U.S. has repeatedly contravened its solemn undertakings to China made in the August 17 Communique and continued its sale of advanced arms and military equipment to Taiwan .令人遗憾的是，美国一再违反自己在“八一七公报”中对中国作出的庄严承诺，不断向台湾出售先进的武器和军事装备。
This would contravene their strict interpretation of religious rules ., 这将违反他们严格的宗教规则.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: from late Latin contravenire, from Latin contra- 'against' + venire 'come'

entry.tran: 违反，违背，触犯(法律或规则)
entry.def: To contravene a law or rule means to do something that is forbidden by the law or rule.

example.ex: The Board has banned the film on the grounds that it contravenes criminal libel laws...
example.tran: 委员会决定禁播这部电影，理由是它触犯了刑事诽谤法。

example.ex: He said the article did not contravene the industry's code of conduct.
example.tran: 他说这一条款并未违反行业的行为准则。

means.word_mean: 1. go against, as of rules and laws;

auth_sentence.content: Either to conform to the tenour of the article, or to contravene it.
auth_sentence.res_content: Either to conform to the tenour of the article, or to contravene it.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Either to conform to the tenour of the article, or to contravene it.

auth_sentence.content: "But I condemn all acts that contravene international human rights," he added.
auth_sentence.res_content: "But I condemn all acts that contravene international human rights," he added.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: "But I condemn all acts that contravene international human rights," he added.

auth_sentence.content: Two of Egypt's top clerics have said the initiative does not contravene Islamic law.
auth_sentence.res_content: Two of Egypt's top clerics have said the initiative does not contravene Islamic law.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Two of Egypt's top clerics have said the initiative does not contravene Islamic law.
